message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that will surely bring you value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I'm interested in purchasing the product for $150.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob, but I have to consider my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $220 for the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate it. I would like to counter with an offer of $200 for the product.
I'm still a bit above your target, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you closer to your price. I can do $210 for the product. This is my final adjustment, though.
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. I appreciate the effort. I would like to counter with an offer of $205 for the product.
I'm not going to budge much further, Bob. I can do $208 for the product, but that's as low as I can go. I'm starting to think you're not serious about buying it.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $207 for the product.
I've given you a lot of flexibility, Bob, and I'm not going to go any lower than $210. This is my last offer. Take it or leave it.
Considering your last offer, I am willing to pay $209 for the product.
